entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 8:51 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
